discourse_list.title: ERC-190 and the Ethereum Package Registry

content.content: I wanted to point out that EthPM registry does not have very many smart contracts registered. It is on Ropsten, perhaps this has something to do with the low adoption, but it may also be a lack of awareness. Is there a way we can increase visibility, or better promote the use of package management?    GitHub    ethpm/ethpm-spec Ethereum Package Manager http://ethpm.github.io/ethpm-spec/ - ethpm/ethpm-spec      EthPM Integration Guide: https://www.ethpm.com/docs/integration-guide
content.GPT-summary: The post discusses the low adoption of smart contracts registered on the EthPM registry and suggests that it may be due to a lack of awareness. The author asks if there is a way to increase visibility and promote the use of package management. The post also includes links to the EthPM registry and an integration guide.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is explaining proposal
